definitions: used or intended to publicly acknowledge a significant or happy day or event

examples.text: the guest of honor at a celebratory dinner

shortDefinitions: used or intended to publicly acknowledge a significant or happy day or event

definitions: feeling or expressing happiness and pride

examples.text: the impending anniversary has the restaurant in a celebratory mood
the scowl was replaced by celebratory smiles for the seven-time series champion

shortDefinitions: feeling or expressing happiness and pride in one's success
